snippet: Neighbors in Flatbush, Brooklyn, were awaked by screams during the blaze, which eight other people escaped.
abstract: Eight-year-old Brooklyn boy dies after a space heater started a fire in house in Flatbush; eight other people escape.

byline.original: By COLIN MOYNIHAN and JULIE TURKEWITZ

lead_paragraph: Neighbors in Flatbush, Brooklyn, were awaked by screams during the blaze, which eight other people escaped.

headline.seo: Space Heater Starts Fire, Killing 8-Year-Old Brooklyn Boy
headline.main: Space Heater Causes Fire, Killing Boy, 8
headline.print_headline: Space Heater Causes Fire, Killing Boy, 8
